item.title: Finish Your Work
item.description: I recently read “Scrum” and several points hit home. In reflecting on my own intellectual and creative pursuits. While I’ve been doing product for well over a decade now there are definitely areas of continued improvement that are needed. It Causes Frustration It’s like Zeno’s paradox; with each touch there’s a further distance from the finish line. Why? Because the habit of non-finishing accrues. So there’s a lack of urgency that begets further non-finishing patterns.

item.title: Enable Us To Pull
item.description: This is what a product manager (any great leader) must do. This is a deceptively simple phrase but there a lot packed in it. This describes the what and the how and the why for achieving success as a team leader. Enable Enablement happens on multiple levels. Unblock sticking points. On any project there will be many sticking points including: (1) From above (e.g., leadership misalignments), (2) from within (e.g., intra-team process, dynamics, lack of cohesion etc.
